```{r}

library(htmltools)

animal_welfare_page <- div(
  class = "project-container",

  div(

        )

  div(
    class = "project-context",
    h2("Background"),
    p(

      a(
        href = "https://www.bbc.com/news",
        target = "_blank",
        strong("BBC News")
      ), 
      " articles. Using computational text analysis, we examine frequency, tone, and framing of ",
      "animal welfare coverage to understand media representation patterns."
    ),
    p(
      "The analysis covers ", strong("3,441 articles"), " published between 2010-2025, revealing ",
      "how language shapes public perception of animal welfare issues."
    )

  # Objectives Section
  div(
    class = "project-objectives",
    h2("Goals"),
    tags$ul(
      tags$li("Scrape and analyze BBC News articles about animal welfare"),

      tags$li("Understand framing devices and subject focus in coverage"),
      tags$li("Quantify negative vs. positive narratives")
    )
  ),
  
  # Key Findings
  div(
    class = "project-findings",
    h2("Results"),
    div(
      class = "findings-grid",
      div(

      div(

        p("1.8:1 ratio of negative-to-positive framing terms"),

    div(

            tags$tr(

            tags$tr(

              tags$td("positive"), 
              tags$td("33")
            ),
            tags$tr(

              tags$td("positive"), 
              tags$td("12")
            )
          )
        )
      )

    # Framing
    div(

      h3("Framing Analysis"),

        tags$li(strong("Policy Discourse:"), " 'law' (24), 'rules' (27)")

      tags$li(strong("Visualization:"), " Created charts and plots to illustrate findings")
    )
```
